subject: Football
Movies
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: In dozens of emails unearthed by hackers, Sony Pictures executives and others discussed altering the script and marketing the movie more as a whistle-blower story than as a condemnation of the N.F.L.
snippet: In dozens of emails unearthed by hackers, Sony Pictures executives and others discussed altering the script and marketing the movie more as a whistle-blower story than as a condemnation of the N.F.L.
